PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-04011999-03-110,  AGRI-FOOD,  FIN,  TB,  ,  , 
PrecisEnactment of the FARM IMPROVEMENT AND MARKETING COOPERATIVES LOANS AND FEES REGULATIONS, 1998 which establish guidelines for the administration of farm improvement loans, and in particular, revise the formula for determining the maximum interest rate on fixed interest rate loans, increase loan registration fees from 0.5% of the principal amount to 0.85%, define the kind of assets that may be held as security, and expand on the number of activities for which a loan guarantee may be obtained.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1999-0122 Publication Date: 1999-03-31
Attachments
